mapper.insert: insert into comment(writer, content, bId) values(#{writer}, #{content}, #{bId})
mapper.select: select max(cId) from comment where cId > 0

select c.cId , c.writer , u.nickName , c.regAt , c.modAt , c.content , c.bId from comment c left join `user` u on c.writer = u.email where c.writer = #{email} GROUP BY c.cId order by c.cId desc limit #{start}, #{size}
select count(cId) from comment where bId = #{bId}
select count(cId) from comment where writer = #{email}
mapper.update: update comment set content = #{content}, modAt = now() where cId = #{cId}
